headline: A Look At Dollar General (DG) Valuation After Guidance Hike And Fresh Analyst Upgrades
summary: Dollar General (DG) has swung back into focus after raising its full year profit outlook following a third quarter beat, alongside fresh attention from major Wall Street firms citing improved execution and customer traffic. See our latest analysis for Dollar General. The recent profit outlook upgrade and fresh interest from major banks have arrived alongside a 90 day share price return of 41.97% and a 1 year total shareholder return of 85.01%. However, the 3 and 5 year total shareholder...
